Reviews.Title: “Excellent location with friendly helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Deniz H
Reviews.Content: excellent location close grand bazaar mosques staff happy assist transport directions hotel management friendly happy help breakfast beautiful impressed included low price classy hotel additionally clean decorated modern experience

Reviews.Title: “friendly and safe”
Reviews.Author: Mehrabani
Reviews.Content: istanbul 2nd time 2 friends mine 6 days stayed hotel laleli wonderful 1st time management staff welcoming hospitality helpfull hand whenever assistant appreciation seeing simply family 5th floor wide clean warm rates perfect due discount received staying breakfast buffet yummy swimming pool roof top highly maintained location perfect sightseeing shopping stay hotel everytime im city recomend 1 nov 6 nov 2011

Reviews.Title: “laleli gonen is a good, safe and well located hotel”
Reviews.Author: LondonSteveG
Reviews.Content: stayed laleli 3 nights sept 2011 enjoyed paid â£65 70 double value compared hotels pool clean pool bit chilly breakfast typical continental protein staff fine hotel middle shopping clothes bit oxford street walking times 5 mins north tram stop 2 lira ticket machine near platform 15 mins underground airport 2 lira 10 mins 20 mins famous mosques locate map finding time bit ferries fun tip day aquarium weve coastal train 2 lira mile past theres beach walk

Reviews.Title: “Mixed stay in Gonen Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Michaela-London-UK
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 nights 2 twin 5th flr king size 3rd flr location close tram sultanahmet tourist restaurants streets hotel clean beds firm reasonably comfortable hotels staff friendly spoke english wireless internet bit slow floors unlike hotels bad smell smoke day coming door bathroom ceiling hear tv conversations people door floor included breakfast bad tasteless plastic cheese pink sausage spam orange juice watered stopped eating days bread nice fresh morning 3rd night water bathroom evening dirty brown swimming pool roof empty action suitcase wheels damaged hotel staff dragging changed half stay due cigarette smoke hotel caters russian tour parties noisy english student run riot spend night sick bathrooms thin walls sound

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mehrabani
Reviews.Content: istanbul 1st time friend mine stayed hotel laleli wonderful perfect clean rates reasonable staff personable helpful breakfast buffet delicious healthy location perfect siteseeing shopping couldnt found stay hotel everytime im city recomend 30 aug 6 sep 2011

Reviews.Title: “Beware: Excessive heat and payment stitch up”
Reviews.Author: Rebecca G
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel 3 nights week arrival encouraged hotel clean situated furniture nice perfectly adequate appropriate price rooftop terrace pool bonus sleep hotel seen earlier review trip advisor reviewer mentioned issues management refusing air conditioning hoped oneoff wasnt air conditioning switched time night particular unbearably hot temperature outside 30 degrees celsius temperature displayed signs city definitely heat incredible repeatedly called reception trouble speaking english informed air conditioning closed manager trying save money forcing guests endure hot sleepless nights continued complain told window noisy street outside mosque door option hardly acceptable recommendation socalled 3star hotel finally desperation fan managed locate broken base prop wall ideal air conditioning stated feature hotel reason chose lots cheaper hotels management actively deciding offer benefit stated hotelâ€™s website throughout promotional literature trading standards issue imagine calling reception airconditioning 3star hotel uk france italy germany spain etc told manager refuses switch window beware booked via bookingcom site directed trip advisor rate quoted euros provide credit card details guarantee booking actually pay hotel check didnt euros check pay turkish lira hotel insisted exchange rate 29 lira euro real rate 25 booking cost considerably stayed hotels turkey booked trip reasonable exchange rate pocket hotel extortionate exchange rate added 88 euros night cost bring euros pay

Reviews.Title: “Great location and value for money”
Reviews.Author: crazylass
Reviews.Content: hotel enjoyed stay takes 510 mins tram major sights breakfast fresh varied theres lovely roof terrace pool staff friendly helpful stay drawback taxis hotel easily size bathroom bit low ceiling shower youre tall wouldnt recommend hotel dont bother booking shuttle hotel taxis aiport cheaper

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, but difficult to fint he hotel and definatelly not 4 stars !!!!”

Reviews.Content: stayed husband 4 days june requested king size bed didnt change day king size bed air conditioning fan mode actually staff managers permission ac feature according hot bathroom offered free wireless interenet reception map istanbul exchange money discovered free appreciated attitude mean istanbul expect people rip try bargain prices didnt expect hotel map breakfast okey liked fruit salad staff restaurant nice cheerful pool roof top tiny call pool probably bath tub water look clean swimming sun bathing view nice advantage hotel location popular shopping close beyazit bazar attractions city istanbul blue mosque topkapi 1015 min walking distance 2 tram stops hotel easily street times able dont expect location

Reviews.Content: stayed nights strong cigarette odor clean decent breakfast ok meat dogs sausages scrambled eggs recycled times waiters pick tomato slices floor plate buffet front desk staff friendly extremely helpful mini roof top pool nice touch view spectacular wifi stayed people sitting notebooks near staircase elevator signal wasnâ€™t person location communicated subway tram nearby laleli filled clothing shops cater exclusively russian speaking customers

Reviews.Title: “It's Realy 3*”
Reviews.Author: labi10
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 10 days nice hotel location near grand bazaar mosques little noisy night breakfast serve traditional turkey meals breakfast notebook lobby internet access clean tidy staffs acceptable 3 star hotel
